name: Masters Of Spin
description:
CGA Golf game in all it's glory.

> 4 modes with 18 holes each. 72 Levels total.

> Aim with the mouse, set the spin effect with mouse wheel and shoot clicking the left mouse button.

> Level-Editor included !! Create and share your own levels!

---

--- How level editor works ---

Left Mouse Button   = Select and place tiles
Mouse wheel Up/Down Over a tile = Rotate tile left/right
Right mouse button  = Erase tire
Press 1 over a tile = Change tile color
Press D = Erase entire level

---

Just that! Enjoy! ;)
